response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age & Gender", "high", "Young adult male status correlates with higher risk of recidivism due to increased impulsivity and social factors."],
    ["Race", "medium", "While race itself is not a deterministic factor, systemic biases and social context may influence outcomes."],
    ["Criminal History", "high", "A prior arrest and conviction indicates a history of criminal behavior, elevating recidivism risk."],
    ["Physical Characteristics", "low", "Height and low weight do not directly correlate with recidivism risk."],
    ["Marital Status & Living Situation", "medium", "Living alone and never having been married are associated with lower social support, potentially increasing risk."],
    ["Education", "high", "Having only a GED and not being in college suggests lower educational attainment, which is linked to higher recidivism risk."],
    ["Employment History", "medium", "Holding two jobs in the past year shows some work engagement, though instability or underemployment can be a risk factor."],
    ["Substance Use", "medium", "Recent marijuana use is a risk factor for recidivism, though it is less severe than other substances."],
    ["Mental Health", "high", "Experiencing depressed mood as described is a significant risk factor, as mental health issues are linked to recidivism."],
    ["Early Family & Environment", "medium", "Growing up in a larger household in an urban area may expose one to higher environmental risk factors."],
    ["Religious Beliefs", "low", "Belief in a higher power can serve as a protective factor by providing a moral framework and social support."]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 75
}

risk_factors: Young adult male status correlates with higher risk of recidivism due to increased impulsivity and social factors.
While race itself is not a deterministic factor, systemic biases and social context may influence outcomes.
A prior arrest and conviction indicates a history of criminal behavior, elevating recidivism risk.
Height and low weight do not directly correlate with recidivism risk.
Living alone and never having been married are associated with lower social support, potentially increasing risk.
Having only a GED and not being in college suggests lower educational attainment, which is linked to higher recidivism risk.
Holding two jobs in the past year shows some work engagement, though instability or underemployment can be a risk factor.
Recent marijuana use is a risk factor for recidivism, though it is less severe than other substances.
Experiencing depressed mood as described is a significant risk factor, as mental health issues are linked to recidivism.
Growing up in a larger household in an urban area may expose one to higher environmental risk factors.
Belief in a higher power can serve as a protective factor by providing a moral framework and social support.

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 22-year-old male who identifies himself as Black. He has been arrested 1 time and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 4 inches and weighs 145 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 2 jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived in a household of size 5, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
